name: VG_Customer_Order_Labeling
query:
SELECT
    so.name,
    aso.name AS "VG_Approve_Order:Link/VG_Approve_Order:50",
    DATE(so.creation) AS Create_Date,
    so.order_type AS Order_Type,
    im.item_name AS Item_Name,
    bm.branch_short_name AS Branch_Name,
    sm.supplier_name AS Supplier,
    'Pending' AS Labeling 
FROM
    `tabVG_Customer_Order` so
    LEFT JOIN `tabItem_Master` im ON im.name = so.prod_name 
    LEFT JOIN `tabBranch_Master` bm ON bm.name = so.branch_name
    LEFT JOIN `tabVG_Approve_Order` aso ON so.name = aso.order_no
    LEFT JOIN `tabSupplier_Master` sm ON sm.name = aso.ass_vendor 
    LEFT JOIN `tabVG_Order_Remarks` ore ON ore.parent = aso.name
    LEFT JOIN `tabItem_Trad_Mst` titm ON titm.name = so.gold_karat 
WHERE
    aso.vend_remarks = 'Vendor Follow up Done'
    AND aso.qc_status = 'Done'
    AND aso.prod_reci IS NULL;
